metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14245 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
An out of bounds read in the function d2alaw_array() in alaw.c oflibsndfile 1.0.28 may lead to a remote DoS attack or informationdisclosure, related to mishandling of the NAN and INFINITY floating-pointvalues.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14245` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.28-4ubuntu0.18.04.1
sndfile-programs - 1.0.28-4ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.28-4ubuntu0.18.04.1').
